Text: How to install and run cumulusx ?

For cumulus there is a Readme inside the folder.
You need to right click and run as administrator.
Install first the main program 'CumulusX.1.8.1' then the patch 'CumulusX.1.8.1-patch'
http://acessa.me/gxyy is a Russian mafia site. Never visit anything pmdgcrackhead suggests.
